definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: discipline, chasten, admonish (Talm. Targum [[סּוֹר]]([[י]])[[יִ]] chastisement; but Aram. [[יְסַר]] is bind )—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 m. sf. [[êויִסְּרֵנִי]] Is 8:11 (Di De SS see Bo:§ 1103 Ew:§ 249 d, but Thes MV Che al.
admonish Is 8:11 (sq. sf. + [[מִלֶּכֶת]] away from walking, i. e. not to walk), Pr 9:7 (‖[[מוֹכִיחַ]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִוָּ֫סֶר עֶ֫בֶד]] Pr 29:19; [[אִוׇּסֵר]] Je 31:18; [[תִּוׇּסְֽרוּ]] Le 26:23; Imv. f. [[הִוׇּסְֽרִי]] Je 6:8; mpl. [[הִיׇסְרוּ]] Ps 2:10; —(Niph. tolerate., Ges:§ 51. 2), let oneself be corrected, admonished by words of man Ps 2:10, Pr 29:19); let oneself be chastened by discipline of God Je 6:8, Je 31:18, Le 26:23.
discipline, correct (the moral nature, with more or less severity acc. to circumstances):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, c. acc. Ho 7:15 (of training arms), De 4:36 (v. Dr), De 8:5 (Israel as son), Is 28:26, happy the man [[אשׁר]] [[תיסרנו יהּ]] Ps 94:12, Ps 118:18, Ps 118:18

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, c. acc. De 8:5, Pr 19:18, Pr 29:17 (all of a father his son), Job 4:3, Pr 31:1, Ps 16:7 my reins (the emotions of my own heart) correct, admonish me.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, sq. acc. pers., Je 31:18; [[אַל־בַּחֲמָֽתְ ְתְיַסְּרֵנִי]] Ps 6:2, Ps 38:2; [[בְּמשׁפט אל באף]] Je 10:24; [[למשׁפט]] Je 30:11 = Je 46:28; [[על]] [[חטאת]] Le 26:18, Le 26:28; [[בתוכחות על עון]] Ps 39:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, a father his son De 21:18; elders a man De 22:18 (including, as perh. De 21:18, bodily chastisement); a king his subjects [[בַּשּׁוֹטִים]] and [[בָּעַקְרַבִּים]] 1Ki 12:11, 1Ki 12:14 = 2Ch 10:11, 2Ch 10:14.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[תְּיַסְּרֵח רָֽעָתֵח]] Je 2:19 thy badness will chastise thee.

definitions.title: Nithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִוַּסְּרוּ]] Ez Eze 23:48 (for [[נִתְוַסְּרוּ]] Ges:§ 55 R. 7); pass. be disciplined, corrected.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. sf. [[אַיְסִירֵם]] (Ew:§ 131 c, but error for [[אֲיַסְּרֵם]] Bö:§ 437 f SS), c. acc. chasten Ho 7:12.
